document.docAuthor: Xue, Xiao-Feng, Song, Zi-Wei & Hong, Xiao-Yue
document.masterDocTitle: Eight new species of the genus Aculus Keifer (Acari: Eriophyidae) from China

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: Eight new species of the genus Aculus Keifer (Acari: Eriophyidae) from China

heading.emphasis:
Key to the species of
Aculus Keifer
from China

paragraph.keyLead:
10 Median and admedian lines connected
................................................................... Aculus rumexis
sp. nov.

- Median and admedian lines separate
............................................................. Aculus pistaciae
Kuang, 1998

14 Prodorsal shield with numerous granules laterally, empodium 7 -rayed
...... Aculus bambusae
Kuang, 1991

- Prodorsal shield without granules, empodium 5 -rayed
....... Aculus broussonetiae
Lin, Jin & Kuang, 1997

- Dorsal annuli with filament-like microtubercles, ventral annuli with round microtubercles........................
.................................................................................................. Aculus sargentodoxae
Wei & Kuang, 1997

- Median and admedian lines present
........................................ Aculus fockeui
(Nalepa &
Trouessart), 1891

21 Prodorsal shield with lateral lobes
........................................................... Aculus populi
Xue & Hong, 2005

26 Prodorsal shield lobe with spines, solenidion knobbed
................. Aculus parafockeui
Liu & Kuang, 1998

- Prodorsal shield lobe without spines, solenidion not knobbed
.......... Aculus huixiansis
Xue & Hong, 2005

27 Prodorsal shield with granules, empodium 5 -rayed
.............................................. Aculus eupteleae
sp. nov.

- Prodorsal shield without granules, empodium 7 -rayed
................... Aculus coggygriae
Xue & Hong, 2005

28 Female
genital coverflap smooth
......................................................... Aculus persicae
Xue & Hong, 2005

- Median line incomplete, dorsal annuli with elliptical microtubercles
................ Aculus changbais
sp. nov.

32 Dorsal annuli with spiny microtubercles
.............................................. Aculus niphlocladae
(
Keifer), 1966

33 Prodorsal shield lobe with spines anteriorly
.............................. Aculus leonuri
Kuang, Luo & Wang, 2005

- Prodorsal shield lobe without spines
................................................. Aculus altissimae
Xue & Hong, 2005

34 Prodorsal shield with granules laterally
............................................. Aculus schlechtendali
(
Nalepa), 1890

35 Admedian and submedian lines separate
............................................... Aculus salicis
Kuang & Luo, 1997

37 Shield design with a distinctive network
................................................ Aculus tetanothrix
(
Nalepa), 1889

- Median and admedian lines connected at basal 1 / 3 , admedian and submedian lines connected by a trans- verse line at basal 2 / 3
......................................................................... Aculus amygdale
Xue & Hong, 2005
